description:
- POST /servers/<id>/metadata responses should include all metadata items, not just what was provided in the request
- PUT /servers/<id>/metadata does not functionally work, even though the unittests pass
title: OSAPI v1.1 instance metadata behaves incorrectly

comments.content:
- POST /servers/<id>/metadata responses should include all metadata items, not just what was provided in the request
- PUT /servers/<id>/metadata does not functionally work, even though the unittests pass
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
